html:
judgment is turned away backward/justice standeth afar off. This statement is another repetition of the idea expressed in 59:9 and 11.

truth is fallen in the street. Integrity has collapsed; it is not even to be found in public (as the street is public), where people are inclined to put on their best appearance.

equity cannot enter. Justice, honesty, and integrity are not allowed as part of Israel's life.
